__e: What nice potatoes! Here's some tourists coming.
It means the potatoes are delicious and I'd like some more.
AND SMELL THE POTATOES. DID YOU EVER JUMP OUT OF A MOVING PLANE? YOU WANT TO BE ALONE, JUST TELL ME.
I'm travelling at 70 miles an hour on top of a bed of potatoes and I think I'm going to be sick.
No, honey, they may look and smell like potatoes, but you never know.
